name: Dominus 2
description:
Dominus 2 is a free multiplayer real time strategy game.

Build villages and capture cities until you have enough income to conquer an enemy's castle. Conquering another player makes them your vassal and gives you a portion of their income. Capture all castles to become Dominus. Hold your position as Dominus for 5 minutes to win the game.

Games of 2 to 6 players last between 5 and 20 minutes. Be sure to read the in-game help page to learn all the rules.
